TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Stepping stones.

How to not go polandball?

Ductape.

How to make Jeb have common sense (stop smiling while plummeting without parachutes or engines).

Reach past the fourth wall and slap him.

How to breach the Fifth Wall?

Shoot a rocket at the ceiling.

How to build a roof?

Place on sky open house!

Why no be has ice-cream?

Is melteed!

How do i be a pkmn mazter?

You ctch thm al

hw 2 vwl?

take a class on German

how to space?

Press the "any key" repeatedly.

Of what use is the ESC key?

To escape from Krypton

How to go 100 mph?

You just did as you wrote it

How to remind a tweet from Amy ...

PIZZA!!!

Kerbal has just cool verbal has? Mean Verbal Kerbal?
What if you close your eyes and you recognize the pizza is a lie and is in fact a pineapple ?

Then look deep through the cats for my own light...

What mean for you has dog?

YOUR MOM

what cheezits/???/?//?///

a valid reason to be shrug yawn and bored crying at infinity

I don't know

I don't know

space

By downloading the internet.

dance on their face.

Flip them upside-down, mirror the first one, and KILL IT!!!
